price: সিহঁতে ক’ব, ‘নিশ্চয় তোমালোকে আমাৰ ওচৰলৈ শপত লৈ আহিছিলা’।
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
